settings.title: Popup
settings.content: You can use this popup to display some useful information to your customers.

settings.subheading: So why use dirty ingredients? We don't.
settings.title: Vagina is not a dirty word.
LET’S TALK ABOUT YOU AND V
settings.content_lt: Most cleansers and soaps have a pH that ranges from 9 to 10.
settings.content_lb: This can cause an overgrowth of bad bacteria that leads to irritation.
settings.content_rt: A healthy vaginal pH is acidic, somewhere between 3.8 to 4.5.
settings.content_rb: Queen V products have a healthy pH of 4.5 to 5.
settings.link_text: ADD QUEEN V TO YOUR ROUTINE

settings.caption: "I never write reviews but I was surprised by how good it was."
"Queen V is taking on the stigma associated with feminine hygiene."

settings.slide-tagline: V on Top of your Health with our Daily Essentials

settings.title: Our Blog
settings.video_text: Our team taste tasted flavored lubes and it didn't go as well as we thought...
